data.Name: Cherry Preview
data.Description: 🍒 are always revealed in preview

data.Name: Strawberry All-In
data.Description: If betting max 🪙, 🍓 are worth ×2 value

data.Name: Lucky Seven
data.Description: 7️⃣ are worth ×3 value in Color patterns

data.Name: Lemon Investment
data.Description: When 🍋 scores, it permanently gains +5 value (🍋 currently worth {symbol_value})

data.Name: Banana Patience
data.Description: When 🍌 appears but doesn't score, it permanently gains +5 value (🍌 currently worth {symbol_value})

data.Name: Bell Specialist
data.Description: 🔔 are worth ×3 value in Symbol patterns

data.Name: Green Apple Income
data.Description: 🍏 is worth 0 value. When 🍏 scores, gain $1

data.Name: Watermelon Hybrid
data.Description: 🍉 counts as both Red and Green

data.Name: Clover Dividend
data.Description: When 🍀 scores, gain $1 (max $5 per round) (Earned: ${earned}/${limit})

data.Name: Token Allowance
data.Description: +3 🪙 per round

data.Name: Deep Forecast
data.Description: Reveal 3 additional symbols in preview

data.Name: Extra Turns
data.Description: +2 🪙 per round *(excluded)*

data.Name: Red Reveal
data.Description: All red symbol positions appear as 🔴 in preview

data.Name: Flat Boost
data.Description: +4 Mult

data.Name: Symbol Specialist
data.Description: If any 3-Symbol pattern scores, +6 Mult

data.Name: Color Specialist
data.Description: If any 4-Color pattern scores, +6 Mult

data.Name: Cash Injection
data.Description: At end of round, gain $4

data.Name: Shop Roller
data.Description: Gain 1 free reroll per shop visit

data.Name: High Interest
data.Description: Interest cap is $40 (instead of $20)

data.Name: Credit Line
data.Description: You can go down to -$20 in debt

data.Name: Expanded Shop
data.Description: +1 shop slot

data.Name: Probability Suppression
data.Description: At start of round, choose 1 of 3 symbols. Chosen symbol appears less often permanently (-1 weight) (Chosen: {symbol})

data.Name: Growing Stipend
data.Description: At end of round, gain $1. Increases by $1 every 3 rounds (Currently: +${scaling_value})

data.Name: Color Scaling
data.Description: This joker gains +1 Mult if you score both Symbol and Color pattern (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Symbol Scaling
data.Description: This joker gains +1 Mult for each Symbol pattern scored (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Mirror Effect
data.Description: Copies the Joker to its left

data.Name: Rightmost Echo
data.Description: Copies the rightmost Joker

data.Name: Value Transfer
data.Description: Choose 2 symbols to swap their values permanently (Swapped: {symbol_from} ↔ {symbol_to})

data.Name: Rare Guarantee
data.Description: At least 1 shop Joker is always Rare or higher

data.Name: Free Uncommon
data.Description: At start of round, gain 1 random Uncommon Joker (requires Joker slot)

data.Name: Pattern Mastery
data.Description: On first preview, choose 1 symbol. Patterns containing it get +1 Mult (Chosen: {symbol})

data.Name: Extra Row
data.Description: +1 grid row (max 5 rows)

data.Name: Second Thoughts
data.Description: At start of round, create a Safety Net Tarot - refund your bet after seeing result (requires Tarot slot)

data.Name: High Roller
data.Description: If betting max 🪙, ×2 Mult

data.Name: Quota Bomb
data.Description: At end of round, reduce quota by 66%. Destroys itself.

data.Name: Foresight
data.Description: Top row is always revealed in preview

data.Name: Corner Lock
data.Description: Choose 1 symbol to always appear in all 4 corners (Chosen: {symbol})

data.Name: Row Lock
data.Description: Choose 1 color to always fill top row (Chosen: {color}). Appears as 🔴 in preview

data.Name: Tarot Tracker
data.Description: When you bet 3🪙 and score 3 or more patterns, gain 1 Tarot (once per round, requires Tarot slot) ({availability})

data.Name: Opening Push
data.Description: For your first 2 spins each round, ×2 Mult ({remaining_status})

data.Name: Red Resonance
data.Description: Red symbols in patterns have 1 in 7 chance to retrigger

data.Name: Wealth Scaling
data.Description: Green symbols get +1 value per $2 you have (Currently: +{scaling_value} value)

data.Name: Yellow Spillover
data.Description: When Yellow symbols gain permanent value, a random non-Yellow symbol gains the same

data.Name: Permanent Payoff
data.Description: When any symbol scores, it permanently gains +10 value

data.Name: Pattern Expansion
data.Description: Unlock V-shape and U-shape patterns

data.Name: Money Multiplier
data.Description: +1 Mult for every $5 you have (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Tarot Milestone
data.Description: When betting 3🪙, 1 in 4 chance to gain 1 Tarot Pack

data.Name: Final Push
data.Description: When you bet all your remaining 🪙, ×2 Mult

data.Name: Symbol Frenzy
data.Description: At end of round, gain 3 bonus 🪙. Spins using these 🪙 only score Symbol patterns

data.Name: Color Frenzy
data.Description: At end of round, gain 3 bonus 🪙. Spins using these 🪙 only score Color patterns

data.Name: Decay Mult
data.Description: +20 Mult. -1 Mult per 🪙 used (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Buyer's Momentum
data.Description: This joker gains +1 Mult for every joker bought (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: All-In Extension
data.Description: Max bet is 4🪙 (×4 Bet Bonus)

data.Name: Top Value Bias
data.Description: Your highest-value symbol appears more often (+1 weight) (Currently: {symbol})

data.Name: Probability Bias
data.Description: Your most common symbol appears more often (+1 weight) (Currently: {symbol})

data.Name: Color Unification
data.Description: Color-specific Joker effects apply to all colors

data.Name: Extra Slot
data.Description: Gain +1 Joker slot permanently. Destroys itself.

data.Name: Tarot Scaling
data.Description: This joker gains +1 Mult for every tarot card used (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Temporary Choice
data.Description: At start of round, choose 1 of 3 temporary Jokers (no slot used)

data.Name: Color Rewrite
data.Description: Permanently change any symbol's color (Changed: {symbol} → {color})

data.Name: Common Burst
data.Description: Create 2 random Common Jokers (requires 2 Joker slots). Destroys itself.

data.Name: Unused Token Income
data.Description: At end of round, gain $1 per unused 🪙

data.Name: Pattern Accumulator
data.Description: This joker gains +0.1 Mult for each pattern scored (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Quad Symbol Focus
data.Description: If 4-Symbol scores, +14 Mult

data.Name: Quad Color Focus
data.Description: If 4-Color scores, +10 Mult

data.Name: Red Affinity
data.Description: +5 Mult if any red symbols are scored

data.Name: Green Affinity
data.Description: +5 Mult if any green symbols are scored

data.Name: Yellow Affinity
data.Description: +5 Mult if any yellow symbols are scored

data.Name: Color Shift
data.Description: Choose 1 of 3 symbols to permanently change its color (Changed: {symbol} → {color})

data.Name: Hungry Maw
data.Description: At start of round, destroy up to 2 adjacent Jokers and gain 4🪙

data.Name: Growth Synergy
data.Description: This joker gains +1 Mult if any symbols gain value (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Symbol Purge
data.Description: Choose 1 of 3 symbols to remove from the game permanently (Removed: {symbol})

data.Name: Blood Sacrifice
data.Description: Sell this to clear quota, but permanently lose 1 Joker slot. Not usable on final round

data.Name: Paid Expertise
data.Description: At start of round, pay $5 (skipped if broke). This joker gains +1 Mult per successful payment (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Red Magnet
data.Description: Red symbols appear more often (+1 weight)

data.Name: Green Magnet
data.Description: Green symbols appear more often (+1 weight)

data.Name: Yellow Magnet
data.Description: Yellow symbols appear more often (+1 weight)

data.Name: Heavy Bettor
data.Description: When you bet 2 or more 🪙, gain $1

data.Name: Quick Cash
data.Description: Gain $10. Destroys itself.

data.Name: Final Hour
data.Description: When you bet all your remaining 🪙, your highest-value symbol appears much more often (+2 weight) (Currently: {symbol})

data.Name: Ticking Treasure
data.Description: After betting 10🪙, gain $15 and destroy this. ({tokens_remaining}🪙 remaining)

data.Name: Pack Expansion
data.Description: Booster packs offer +1 choice

data.Name: Silver Lining
data.Description: Your 2nd highest-value symbol is worth ×2 value (Currently: {symbol})

data.Name: Money Doubler
data.Description: Double your money (max +$15). Destroys itself.

data.Name: Infinite Capacity
data.Description: Gain +1 Joker slot (Can buy 3 this run)

data.Name: Grid Expansion
data.Description: +1 grid column (Can buy 1 this run)

data.Name: Chromatic Mastery
data.Description: Unlock 6-Color pattern

data.Name: Symbol Mastery
data.Description: Unlock 6-Symbol pattern

data.Name: Perfect Copy
data.Description: Duplicate any owned Joker (requires Joker slot) (Can buy 1 this run)

data.Name: Triple Match
data.Description: If pattern has 3+ identical symbols, +10 Mult

data.Name: Color Trio
data.Description: If pattern has 3+ same-color symbols, +8 Mult

data.Name: Green Fortune
data.Description: When Green symbols score, 1 in 20 chance to gain $1

data.Name: Yellow Growth
data.Description: When Yellow symbols score, 1 in 10 chance to permanently gain +5 value

data.Name: Shop Reset
data.Description: Sell this to reroll the shop

data.Name: Rainbow Guarantee
data.Description: Grid always has 2 Rainbow symbols (count as any color)

data.Name: Borrowed Time
data.Description: Gain $15. Lose 3🪙 next round. Destroys itself.

data.Name: All-In Reward
data.Description: When you bet max 🪙, gain $2

data.Name: Underdog Bonus
data.Description: Your 2 least common symbols are worth ×3 value (Currently: {symbol1}, {symbol2})

data.Name: Joker Scout
data.Description: Sell this to discover 1 of 3 Jokers

data.Name: Bet Amplifier
data.Description: +4 Mult per 🪙 bet this spin

data.Name: Cross Training
data.Description: This joker gains +1 Mult for each Symbol pattern scored (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Rainbow Shift
data.Description: Replaces 4-Color with 4-Rainbow (4 adjacent symbols where each differs from its left neighbor). Retriggers 4-Rainbow symbols. Disables other Color patterns

data.Name: Eternal Joker
data.Description: Round doesn't end when quota is met

data.Name: Overflow
data.Description: Requires Eternal Joker. Excess points carry to next round

data.Name: Double Pair
data.Description: Replaces color patterns with Two-Pair (4 adjacent as pair + pair, e.g. 🍒🍒🍋🍋). Retriggers 2-Pair-Color symbols. Disables other Color patterns

data.Name: Blind Faith
data.Description: No preview phase. At end of round, gain $20

data.Name: Decay Engine
data.Description: All other Jokers expire in 3 rounds. Cannot be sold. At end of round, +5 Mult

data.Name: Tarot Trade
data.Description: At start of round, gain 1 Tarot (requires Tarot slot). -3 🪙 this round

data.Name: Permanent Collection
data.Description: All Jokers cannot be sold. +3 Joker slots

data.Name: Joker Vault
data.Description: Store up to 3 Jokers in reserve (can swap during shop) *(excluded)*

data.Name: Sole Survivor
data.Description: Duplicate 1 random Joker. Destroys all others (including this).

data.Name: Bet Doubler
data.Description: At start of round, create a Bet Doubler Tarot (requires Tarot slot)

data.Name: Red Amplifier
data.Description: Red symbols are worth ×2 value

data.Name: Green Amplifier
data.Description: Green symbols are worth ×2 value

data.Name: Yellow Amplifier
data.Description: Yellow symbols are worth ×2 value

data.Name: Color Harmony
data.Description: If Red, Green, and Yellow all scored this spin, +3 Mult *(excluded)*

data.Name: Loaded Dice
data.Description: Doubles all listed probabilities (e.g. 1 in 4 → 2 in 4)

data.Name: High Stakes Growth
data.Description: This joker gains +1 Mult when you bet 3+ 🪙 (Currently: +{scaling_value} Mult)

data.Name: Color Roulette
data.Description: At start of round, a random color is chosen. That color's symbols are worth ×3 value this round (This round: {random_color})

data.Name: Rock Bottom
data.Description: If you have $0 or less, ×2 Mult

data.Name: Rising Star
data.Description: At start of round, a random symbol permanently appears more often (+1 weight) (Last boosted: {last_symbol})

data.Name: Sixth Sense
data.Description: Every 6th spin, ×3 Mult ({spins_until} spins until trigger)

data.Name: Sunset Blend
data.Description: Red symbols also count as Yellow and vice versa

data.Name: Lucky Trio
data.Description: 🔔, 🍀, and 7️⃣ are worth ×4 value

data.Name: Mystic Pouch
data.Description: +1 Tarot slot

data.Name: Pattern Surge
data.Description: If you score 3+ patterns, +8 Mult

data.Name: Fortune Teller
data.Description: At first preview, predict if first spin scores higher or lower than second (ignoring Bet Bonus). If correct, this joker gains ×0.5 Mult (Currently: ×{scaling_value} Mult)
